availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James Ashley Franklin, Jr. (Hopkins Co., KY, farmer)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. Hopkins County, Kentucky, native. Son of James A. Franklin, Sr. and Rebecca Franklin. Married to Nancy H. Southard Franklin in Hopkins County, Kentucky, on February 23, 1853. Father of Stephen A. Franklin, Sarah J. Franklin, William Franklin, and Union J. Franklin. Farmer and student in Hopkins County in 1850. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 1, p. 81B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 729.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, Charleston, p. 100A.
